prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with vibrant purple and gold colors, featuring unique antennae and a sleek body.
Imagine a creature that combines elegance and mystery, with a shimmering white and purple appearance.
Design a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of cosmic energy with a striking golden and teal color scheme.
Generate a mythical Pokemon with a flowing body and intricate patterns, showcasing a blend of white and orange hues.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a celestial being, featuring glowing accents and a graceful silhouette.
Make a creature with a delicate yet powerful presence, showcasing purple and gold tones in its design.
I want a Pokemon that feels otherworldly, with elegant features and an ethereal color palette of white and teal.
